thought: To craft red_sandstone_slab, I need to place 3 red_sandstone or chiseled_red_sandstone side by side in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will move 1 chiseled_red_sandstone from slot 45 to slot 1.
act: move from slot 45 to slot 1 with quantity 1
